Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
August 2021 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Welcome to the August 2021 Edition of the Justia Insider! The time for company updates and announcements has come. However, we highly encourage you to be extremely careful with your health. Please continue to stay at home and observe physical distancing. While some people are already fully vaccinated, others are not. In the interim, do not let your guard down, and stay safe by all means.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Letâ€™s Find Out Whatâ€™s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Consumer Content: We are constantly looking to improve our websites to make them as user-friendly as possible. In our continued efforts, we modified the left-hand sidebar navigation look and feel as well as the snippet blocks within the content area.

Marketing Site Update: Time and again, we show that we are quite able to work a faster pace if and when needed. We adjusted our Amplify marketing message across our marketing website in an effort to keep up with the ever-changing Google updates.

Sales Proposals: We released a new format for our JLD sales proposal. These are the great-looking, professional, customized PDF files that we generate automatically for our prospective clients.

Email Blasts: In addition to our regular monthly campaigns, we promoted our Amplify services to our current audience. And we are also expanding our reach to former Justia clients, so they get to know our newest services.

State Codes: Our team is right in the middle of the yearly State Codes update right now. So we are constantly releasing new versions for each of the states like Washington, New Jersey, West Virginia, etc.

Backend Maintenance: Our IT team is working hard as always. This month we continued upgrading database servers by taking care of our internal SEO Tool. In addition, we performed a mass update to many of our application servers to improve the performance across the board.

Automated QA: After taking care of the footer QA, our QA team released automated checks for Justia standard header layouts. This allows us to maintain our standards across all of the Justia Web Properties.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • New Centers: Weâ€™ve created the content for Sports Law, Native American Law, Agricultural Law, and Aviation Law during the past month. Once these are converted, all legal guide centers will adhere to the modern portal design.
  • COVID-19 Updates: We've made a (hopefully) final round of updates to the 50-state surveys on mask mandates, travel restrictions, evictions, court operations, and general restrictions.
  • Informational Boxes for Core Centers: ur team has completed the informational boxes for Criminal Law and DUI Law, and we have started the process for Personal Injury Law. This will make these pages more engaging to non-legal readers.
  • Changes to Titles of Legal Guides Pages: We've updated the titles of hundreds of legal guide pages to make them more informative and intuitive to readers.
  • Cannabis Law Center: Weâ€™ve started creating content for this brand new center for business owners, employees, and investors in the marijuana industry.

Engineering Team

Hi! I am Miriam, and I am an economist with a computer science background. I am very excited about joining the Justia Mexico team. I have two children, and I like to spend time with my family and enjoy reading, solving riddles, dancing, doing outside activities, and yoga. I also like to go shopping.

TEAM ACTIVITY

Justia International Super Trivia Challenge

We had our Justia International Super Trivia Challenge. In this Jeopardy-themed trivia game, two teams faced each other by taking turns choosing a category and answering questions to accumulate points. Each matchup consisted of five categories with four questions in each category. Congratulations to The Magnificent 7, the absolute winners! Thank you all for participating.

Hackathon

Our Justia Hackathon 2021 has come to an end. We are happy to see the results and congratulate the top three Hackathon winners. As you recall, our engineering team was allowed to pick and work on their projects for a whole day. Congratulations, and thank you for bringing something new to the entire team.

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

Kurzgesagt - YouTube Channel

Available on YouTube

Kurzgesagt means â€˜In a Nutshellâ€™ in German, and it is just animation videos explaining things with optimistic nihilism. The studioâ€™s YouTube channel focuses on minimalist animated educational content, using the flat design style. I like it because it discusses scientific, technological, political, philosophical, and psychological subjects. Most of their videos put some really interesting things into perspective.

- Miguel Saldivar
